Subroutine sortcomp

905 : 
906 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
907 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
908 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
909 : 
910 :       subroutine sortcomp (invar, dim_invar, objfun, dim_objfun)
911 :       implicit none
912 : 
913 : !     * Declarations
914 :       INTEGER, DIMENSION(2), INTENT(in) :: dim_invar
915 :       REAL*8, DIMENSION(dim_invar(1),dim_invar(2)), INTENT(inout) :: invar
916 :       INTEGER, INTENT(in) :: dim_objfun
917 :       REAL*8, DIMENSION(dim_objfun), INTENT(inout) :: objfun
918 : 
919 : !     * Definitions
920 :       INTEGER :: i_, j_(1)
921 : 
922 :       REAL*8,  DIMENSION(:),   ALLOCATABLE :: objfun2
923 :       REAL*8,  DIMENSION(:,:), ALLOCATABLE :: invar2
924 :       INTEGER, DIMENSION(:),   ALLOCATABLE :: newobjfun
925 : 
926 :       allocate(objfun2(dim_objfun))
927 :       allocate(invar2(dim_invar(1),dim_invar(2)))
928 :       allocate(newobjfun(dim_objfun))
929 : 
930 : !     * EXTERNAL compar
931 : 
932 :       objfun2(:) = objfun(:)
933 :       newobjfun(:) = -99                          ! NEEDED TO SEPARATE EQUAL O.F. VALUES
934 :       invar2(:,:) = invar(:,:)
935 : !     call qsort(objfun(:), dim, 8, compar)       ! USE compar(b,c)=(c-b)/dabs(c-b)
936 :       call qsort(objfun(:), dim_objfun)
937 :       do i_ = 1, dim_objfun
938 :         j_ = minloc(real(dabs(objfun2(:) - objfun(i_))), newobjfun(:) .lt. 0)
939 :         newobjfun(j_(1)) = i_
940 :         invar(:,i_) = invar2(:,j_(1))
941 :       enddo
942 : 
943 :       deallocate(objfun2)
944 :       deallocate(invar2)
945 :       deallocate(newobjfun)
946 : 
947 :       return
948 :       end subroutine sortcomp
